subject: Playoff Games
Football
lead_paragraph: Peyton Manning, at 37, passed for 400 yards in the A.F.C. championship game and will play in the N.F.L.’s finale for the first time in four years.
snippet: Peyton Manning, at 37, passed for 400 yards in the A.F.C. championship game and will play in the N.F.L.’s finale for the first time in four years.
